title: Leauge won't open after i restart my pc
body: x hey guys so i found a fix to this if you have AVG just delete it it's blocking the lol servers try finding another anit virus :)

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaaa sometimes AVG has been known to block League's connections. Sometimes I'm hesitant to suggest this, since of course disabling a firewall could have unintended consequences. Be sure to re-enable your antivirus when needed!
